00001 #ifndef DDMD_TWO_STEP_INTEGRATOR_CPP
00002 #define DDMD_TWO_STEP_INTEGRATOR_CPP
00003 
00004 /*
00005 * Simpatico - Simulation Package for Polymeric and Molecular Liquids
00006 *
00007 * Copyright 2010 - 2012, David Morse (morse012@umn.edu)
00008 * Distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
00009 */
00010 
00011 #include "TwoStepIntegrator.h"
00012 #include <ddMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00013 #include <ddMd/storage/AtomStorage.h>
00014 #include <ddMd/communicate/Exchanger.h>
00015 #include <ddMd/potentials/pair/PairPotential.h>
00016 #include <util/ensembles/BoundaryEnsemble.h>
00017 #include <util/util/Log.h>
00018 #include <util/global.h>
00019 
00020 // Uncomment to enable paranoid validity checks.
00021 //#define  DDMD_INTEGRATOR_DEBUG
00022 
00023 namespace DdMd
00024 {
00025    using namespace Util;
00026 
00027    /*
00028    * Constructor.
00029    */
00030    TwoStepIntegrator::TwoStepIntegrator(Simulation& simulation)
00031     : Integrator(simulation)
00032    {}
00033 
00034    /*
00035    * Destructor.
00036    */
00037    TwoStepIntegrator::~TwoStepIntegrator()
00038    {}
00039 
00040    /*
00041    * Run integrator for nStep steps.
00042    */
00043    void TwoStepIntegrator::run(int nStep)
00044    {
00045       bool needExchange;
00046       nStep_ = nStep;
00047 
00048       #ifdef DDMD_INTEGRATOR_DEBUG
00049       simulation().isValid();
00050       #endif
00051 
00052       // Compute nAtomTotal.
00053       atomStorage().unsetNAtomTotal();
00054       atomStorage().computeNAtomTotal(domain().communicator());
00055 
00056       // Clear all stored computations, compute nAtomTotal.
00057       simulation().modifySignal().notify();
00058 
00059       #ifdef DDMD_INTEGRATOR_DEBUG
00060       simulation().isValid();
00061       #endif
00062 
00063       // Main MD loop
00064       timer().start();
00065       exchanger().timer().start();
00066       for (iStep_ = 0; iStep_ < nStep_; ++iStep_) {
00067 
00068          if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00069             if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00070                simulation().diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00071             }
00072          }
00073          timer().stamp(DIAGNOSTIC);
00074  
00075          // First step of integration: Update positions, half velocity 
00076          integrateStep1();
00077          timer().stamp(INTEGRATE1);
00078   
00079          // Unset precomputed values of all energies, stresses, etc.
00080          simulation().modifySignal().notify();
00081 
00082          #ifdef DDMD_INTEGRATOR_DEBUG
00083          simulation().isValid();
00084          #endif
00085 
00086          // Check if exchange and reneighboring is necessary
00087          needExchange = atomStorage().needExchange(domain().communicator(), 
00088                                                    pairPotential().skin());
00089          timer().stamp(Integrator::CHECK);
00090 
00091          // Exchange atoms if necessary
00092          if (needExchange) {
00093             atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00094             if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL && atomStorage().isCartesian()) {
00095                atomStorage().transformCartToGen(boundary());
00096                timer().stamp(Integrator::TRANSFORM_F);
00097             }
00098             exchanger().exchange();
00099             timer().stamp(Integrator::EXCHANGE);
00100             pairPotential().buildCellList();
00101             timer().stamp(Integrator::CELLLIST);
00102             if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00103                atomStorage().transformGenToCart(boundary());
00104                timer().stamp(Integrator::TRANSFORM_R);
00105             }
00106             atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00107             pairPotential().buildPairList();
00108             timer().stamp(Integrator::PAIRLIST);
00109          } else {
00110             exchanger().update();
00111             timer().stamp(UPDATE);
00112          }
00113    
00114          #ifdef DDMD_INTEGRATOR_DEBUG
00115          simulation().isValid();
00116          #endif
00117 
00118          // Calculate new forces for all local atoms. Also calculate virial stresses
00119          // for constant pressure ensemble. Both methods send the modifyForce signal.
00120          if (simulation().boundaryEnsemble().isRigid()) {
00121             computeForces();
00122          } else {
00123             computeForcesAndVirial();
00124          }
00125 
00126          // 2nd step of integration, which finishes the velocity update.
00127          // This method normally call simulation().velocitySignal().notify()
00128          integrateStep2();
00129          timer().stamp(INTEGRATE2);
00130    
00131          #ifdef DDMD_INTEGRATOR_DEBUG
00132          simulation().isValid();
00133          #endif
00134 
00135       }
00136       exchanger().timer().stop();
00137       timer().stop();
00138 
00139       // Reduce statistics for run
00140       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00141       timer().reduce(domain().communicator());
00142       exchanger().timer().reduce(domain().communicator());
00143       #endif
00144 
00145       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00146          Log::file() << std::endl;
00147       }
00148 
00149    }
00150 
00151 }
00152 #endif
